Reason: The configuration option hints_flush_period_in_ms is performance-sensitive. This is because the value of hints_flush_period_in_ms directly determines how often hints are flushed from the internal buffers to disk in the HintsService class. The periodic flushing of hints from buffers is a time-expensive operation that can significantly impact system performance. Therefore, any changes to the hints_flush_period_in_ms configuration can lead to notable performance variations at the system level.
